title: Person Climbing
description:
A rock climber, shown climbing up a rock formation. Some platforms show the climber with a helmet and/or rope. The Emojipedia Sample image was created with assistance from World Champion Rock Climber Sasha DiGiulian.

Variations exist for üßó‍‚ôÄÔ∏è Woman Climbing and üßó‍‚ôÇÔ∏è Man Climbing.
apple_vendor_description: The person climbing emoji on Apple devices showcases an individual with dynamic posture, actively ascending, their form sculpted with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and soft rounded edges. The play of light across their limbs suggests exertion and determination, embodying a spirit of challenge and achievement. It's an ideal visual cue for discussing fitness goals, overcoming obstacles, or celebrating personal progress in any message sent on Apple devices.
